text: The is an ancient Japanese burial mound. It is located in Ōagata Shrine in the city of Inuyama, Aichi in the Tōkai region of Japan. In 1983 the Japanese government declared it a National Historic Site of Japan. It is the second biggest kofun in Aichi Prefecture after the Danpusan Kofun in Nagoya. == References == == Other websites == * Aichi Prefecture Cultural Properties * Inuyama tourist information site * Inuyama City official site * Oagata Jinja home page Category:History of Japan Category:Burial monuments and structures Category:4th-century works
title: Aotsuka Kofun
